column5: I welcome you to Dallas whether it is for business or pleasure. Please enjoy my comfortable 2 bedroom/2.5 bathrooms/2 assigned covered parking spaces, 2-story condominium. Great location near Dallas/Plano borderline, near major highways, George Bush/North Dallas Tollway. Within minutes of willow bend mall, shops of legacy, Dallas Galleria. Grocery store(Kroger), Chase, Bank of America just across the street. Plenty of fine dining within minutes.
